text.dreadandscalesorigins.become_elder: You have grown into an Elder Guardian!
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.snowgolem.d: Golems made from snow, and weak to anything that might melt them
power.dreadandscalesorigins.heat_weaknes: You take damage over time in hot biomes
power.dreadandscalesorigins.greater_gole: Snow Golems you make are more powerful
power.dreadandscalesorigins.stronger_sno: Snowballs you throw are packed with ice, and deal 1 damage!
power.dreadandscalesorigins.snow_trail.d: You leave a trail of snow.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.frigid_stren: Deal more damage in cold areas.
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.witch.name: Witch
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.witch.descr: Cruel and cackling, Witches are masters of brewing, and are great with magic
power.dreadandscalesorigins.potion_actio: Get a random potion effect, based on the situation you are in.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.pillager_ali: Villagers don't like you, and pillagers like you!
power.dreadandscalesorigins.better_potio: You consume potions better than most, Potions will last longer when you drink them.
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.strider.des: Travel the vast oceans of lava with the speed of a strider
power.dreadandscalesorigins.lava_walk.de: You have the ability to walk on lava source blocks!
power.dreadandscalesorigins.lava_speed.d: You are slower by default, but get a lot of more speed on lava
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.evoker.name: Evoker
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.evoker.desc: Master of Magic, and a collector of Totems.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.summon_fangs: You gain the ability to summon fangs!
power.dreadandscalesorigins.lower_totem_: Totems have a 10% not to break on use
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.guardian.de: Guardians are known for protecting their Monuments and the treasured sponges within. Some are known for evolving into Elder Guardians.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.guardian_spi: Spikes that have a chance to damage attackers!
power.dreadandscalesorigins.monument_spa: You spawn at a Ocean Monument
power.dreadandscalesorigins.land_slownes: You are slower while on land.
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.elder_guard: Elder Guardians are the leaders of monuments, and wield more power than normal guardians
Summon a effect cloud of mining fatigue
power.dreadandscalesorigins.elder_spikes: Stronger Spikes that have a chance to damage attackers!
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.slime.name: Slime
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.slime.descr: Green blobs of Jello, that bounce all around!
power.dreadandscalesorigins.bouncy.name: Bouncy
power.dreadandscalesorigins.bouncy.descr: All blocks act like slime blocks
power.dreadandscalesorigins.split.name: Split Ability
power.dreadandscalesorigins.split.descri: Turn your food points into a small slime to defend you!
power.dreadandscalesorigins.small_weak.d: When at less than 2 hearts, you deal almost no damage, but your attacks have stronger knockback!
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.wolf.name: Wolf
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.wolf.descri: Strong and Fast, Wolves are creatures that have strength in numbers.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.full_moon.de: During a full moon, you get Faster, Stronger, and Healthier
power.dreadandscalesorigins.wolf_body.de: You have 2 less hearts of health than humans.
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.bee.name: Bee
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.bee.descrip: A flying insect that pollinates the world, spreading flowers and honey all around.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.stinger.name: Stinger
power.dreadandscalesorigins.stinger.desc: When you punch someone with your fist, you poison them for a few seconds
power.dreadandscalesorigins.flower_power: When near multiple flowers, you gain regeneration.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.queen_bee.de: When you collect honey, the bees won't try to attack you.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.small_bug.de: You have 2 less hearts of health than humans.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.bee_wings.de: You can use your tiny bee wings to descend slower as an ability
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.fox.name: Fox
origin.dreadandscalesorigins.fox.descrip: Sly and cunning, foxes are timid animals who enjoy eating berries, and stealing items.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.timid_creatu: Your speed increases when you are around more than 3 other players.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.better_berri: Sweet Berries taste extra delicious to you!
power.dreadandscalesorigins.careful_gath: Sweet Berry Bushes don't hurt you at all.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.item_collect: You have a larger item pickup radius.
power.dreadandscalesorigins.sly.name: Sly
power.dreadandscalesorigins.small_fox.de: You have 2 less hearts of health than humans.
